title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, timeline, and resource requirements. Create a project plan and establish communication channels with stakeholders.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, interviews, and surveys to understand the target audience and their needs. Define functional and non-functional requirements for the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the ThoughtStreamNovelizer project. The design should include the brain-computer interface, data processing pipeline, narrative generation components, and associated infrastructure. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects. Provide a detailed breakdown of components, their interactions, potential challenges/solutions, and outline the overall system flow in a clear, concise manner. Ensure that the design is flexible enough to accommodate future enhancements while maintaining optimal functionality.

title: Brain-Computer Interface Development
description: Develop the hardware and software components for capturing and interpreting brain signals.

title: Data Processing Pipeline
description: Build a pipeline for processing and transforming raw brain data into a format suitable for narrative generation.

title: Narrative Generation Engine
description: Develop an AI-powered engine capable of generating coherent and engaging narratives from the processed brain data.

title: User Interface Design (Revised)
description: Design an intuitive and user-friendly interface for interacting with the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system. The revised interface should allow users to easily initiate, control, and safely terminate the brain-computer interface (BCI), as well as view, manage, and export the generated narrative content in various formats (e.g., text, audio, video). The interface should include a tutorial or guided onboarding process for new users, and be accessible to people with different abilities. The design should also incorporate feedback mechanisms allowing users to rate their experience and provide suggestions for improvement. The interface's aesthetics should reflect the creativity and personal nature of the generated literature. The revised UI design should take into account the dependencies mentioned, particularly Requirements Gathering and Analysis and BCI Safety Mechanisms Design.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface based on the approved design, integrating with the backend components.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute tests to ensure the system meets functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations - Revised
description: Exhaustively scrutinize potential security and privacy risks inherent to the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system, devise and implement preventive measures for identified threats, maintain conformance with pertinent regulations and industry standards, meticulously document all procedures, and incorporate updates in the technical documentation.

title: Deployment and Infrastructure
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure and environments for deploying and running the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system.
